channel.title: Authors on Rupeng Yang
channel.description: Recent content in Authors on Rupeng Yang

item.description:
I am currently a postdoc researcher in The University of Hong Kong, hosted by A/Prof. Man Ho Au. I will join University of Wollongong as a lecturer in the fall (spring in Australia) of 2020. I received my PhD at Shandong University in 2019, advised by Prof. Qiuliang Xu.

I am interested in theoretical and applied cryptography, including:

  • Lattice-Based Cryptography
  • Cryptographic Watermarking
  • Privacy-Preserving Protocols
  • Cryptography under Physical Attacks
  • Foundation of Cryptography

    • [Google Scholar | DBLP]
